Certification

Domestic

Class 1: Single Dwellings (detached or attached)

Extensions, additions, alterations and renovations
New build and demolish

Class 10: Non-habitable building pr structure

Carports, sheds, verandas & patios
Retaining walls, solar panels
Swimming pools & fencing

Commercial

Class 2: Unit Buildings
Class 3: Accommodation buildings
Class 5: Offices
Class 6: Shops
Class 7: Carparks
Class 8: Factories
Class 9: Hospitals & Schools

Consultation

We understand time is valuable, if you are unsure about the certification process and would like a phone meeting FREE of charge to clarify any queries on your project, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Professional consultancy services offered include;
Alternative Solutions
Fire and pool safety reports
Building code interpretation and analysis
Deemed-to-Satisfy compliance

Council Lodgement

Once you receive your building permit there is not need to contact council or worry about lodging further documentation, as apart of our services all documentation is lodged with the appropriate council for you.
